previewPlan.name: Special Focus: Core Level 1
previewPlan.description:
#### **Special Focus: Core Level 1**

This six week training plan is specifically designed to improve your core strength and pelvic stability, which is often neglected in endurance athletes. With three short focused sessions per week this is the perfect way to get in the extra time to concentrate on the three dimensional segment from shoulder to hip. You can add this as an off-season block or an extra bump to your regular season training. These workouts will target core muscles but will also include considerable demand for the smaller muscles of the upper body.

​

Level 1 is the place to start if you are new to training your core or if you are coming back after an extended lay-off of over six months. As with any of the SYSTM strength plans, take your time with each session and follow the proper progression to maximize gains.

​

This plan may be applied in conjunction with other Special Focused strength plans or with one of the 12 week add-ons for extra core training. However, if you add concurrent strength plans please be mindful that you are getting adequate recovery between workouts.

​

The Special Focus stand alone plans follow a 2:1 progression and have three sessions per week on Monday, Wednesday and Friday.

​

Here we go!
previewPlan.planDescription: This plan is designed to target core strength and hip mobility.

prospects.name: Core & Hip Mobility A
prospects.description:
This module is a ground-based session designed to improve mobility through your hips and low back while activating and integrating muscles that are key to core stability. Take your time to work through the movements and focus on quality. Be sure to rotate through the other routines in this series on a regular basis for maximum benefit.

​

Exercises:

- Inchworm
- Pigeon Stretch
- Hip Bridge w/Knee Squeeze
- Marching Hip Bridge
- Back Extension w/Arms Overhead
- Quadruped w/Alt. Leg/Arm
- Bird Dog
- Kneeling Pelvic Tilt

prospects.name: Core Focus 01
prospects.description:
_Looking to improve ALL of the muscles that make up your core? You’ve come to the right place. The Core Focus series builds up everything from your hip to your shoulders - front, back, and side._

​

To do this, we’ll take you through a variety of contraction types: eccentric (lengthening), concentric (shortening), and isometric (holding a position). The result? Improved core strength, stability, and endurance. You'll find exercises that carry over into other areas of your body, but all of the moves have a significant impact on your core. Level 1 is ideal for very beginners. Even then, you may find some of these moves challenging if you have never attempted them. That’s ok, take your time and pause the video if you need. Soon you’ll be on your way to mastering your core potential. In addition to a mat, you'll need some open wall space for this routine.

​

Unsure if this is the correct strength level for you? [Click here for help.](https://wahoosystm.com/HelpCenterChooseStrengthLevel)

​

**Exercises Included:**

- Split Stance Side Bend w/ Arms Overhead
- Downward Dog
- Quadruped T-Spine Rotation
- Back Extension w/ opp arm & leg raise
- Hamstring Hip Bridge
- Oblique Leg Lifts
- Quadruped w/ alternating arm raise
- Quad w/ leg raises
- Low Side Plank w/ toe-tap front/back
- High Side Plank w/ Hold
- Quad Toes w/ Alternate Arm Raise
- Quadruped Pull In & Hold
- Quadruped Push Out & Hold
- Bird Dogs
- Back Extension with Hold
- Child's Pose

prospects.name: Core & Hip Mobility B
prospects.description:
This ground-based session is designed to improve mobility through your hips and low back while activating and integrating muscles that are key to core stability. Take your time to work through the movements and focus on quality. Be sure to rotate through the other routines in this series on a regular basis for maximum benefit.

​

Exercises:

- Pigeon Stretch
- Double Leg Hip Bridge
- Marching Hip Bridge
- Back Extension w/ Opp Arm & Leg Raise
- Bird Dog
- Single-Leg Hip Bridge
- Oblique Leg Lift w/Crossed Legs

prospects.name: Core & Hip Mobility C
prospects.description:
This module is a standing-based session designed to improve mobility through your hips, and challenge balance while activating and integrating muscles that are key to core stability. Take your time to work through the movements and focus on quality. Be sure to rotate through the other routines in this series on a regular basis for maximum benefit.

​

Exercises:

- Split Stance Back Bend
- Single-Leg Hip Hinge
- Split Stance Side Bend w/Arms Overhead
- Single-Leg Hip Hinge w/Rotation
- Downward Dog
- Pigeon Stretch

prospects.name: Core Focus 02
prospects.description:
_Looking to improve ALL of the muscles that make up your core? You’ve come to the right place. The Core Focus series builds up everything from your hip to your shoulders - front, back, and side._

​

In this session, we increase the coordination demands on your core by introducing more dynamic movements. This will challenge your ability to control unwanted movement and help you use your core to generate power throughout your body.

Recommended for those who have mastered Level 1 or who have a bit of experience with core strength training.

​

Unsure if this is the correct strength level for you?  [Click here for help.](https://wahoosystm.com/HelpCenterChooseStrengthLevel)

​

**Exercises Included:**

- Split Stance Side Bend w/ Arms Overhead
- Downward Dog
- Quadruped T-Spine Rotation
- Quadruped Pull In & Hold
- Quadruped Push Out & Hold
- Bird Dogs
- V ups
- Oblique Leg Lifts
- Marching Hip Bridge
- Pushup w/ Rotation
- Forward Bear Crawl
- Hip Hikes
- Sit Throughs
- Kneeling Hip Extension
- Single-Leg Hip Bridge
- Low Side Plank w/abduction and hold
- Back Extension w/ Opposite arm & leg raise
- High Side Plank w/ rotation
- Back Extension with Hold
- Child's Pose

​

prospects.name: Completed Level 1 Strength
prospects.description:
Congratulations on completing Level 1 Strength!

We recommend starting on Level 2 for your next plan.
prospects.notes: Nice work! Time to Level Up!
